channel.title: Assigning a mage attack?
channel.description: how can i assign a mage attack to an npc, that hits every player in a certain area around it (lets say 5x5 square area) with a certain gfx?

item.title: Assigning a mage attack?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:2, topic:369784”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=465908.msg3406992#msg3406992 date=1290389107]
how can i assign a mage attack to an npc, that hits every player in a certain area around it (lets say 5x5 square area) with a certain gfx?
[/quote]

Do you mean like Iban From Underground Pass in Runescape?[/quote]
i guess, like bandos’s range attack, except a mage attack.

Read full topic
